page.title: 17USES OF THE THREE SISTERS
page.content: The THREE SISTERS recreation area has three main uses:- {THE ARENA}contains a racing circiut over 1100metres in length.This is used for karting,motorcycling,cycle racing,and model aeroplane flying.The facilities that have been developed are some of the best in the country. {THE LAKE} covers an area of some 4.5 acres and is a safe and ideal site for many watersports,including canoeing,sailboarding,and model boating.Changing facilities have recently been completed to further enhance the attraction of the area. {THE WILDLIFE}of the area is very varied , as the area has grassland habitats,woodlands and a protected lake habitat.There are many planned nature trails and footpaths giving the nature lover ample opportunity to explore the area.
